input.sentences: the party was just starting to kick off when 3 lovely ladies showed up .
[male] really did n't want to be serving at this party .
[male] was happy to just be | he loved meeting new people at his job .
[female] could n't run out of there fast enough when the people started pouring in .

output.sentences: The lovely ladies were happy the party was starting.
A male waiter was outside serving drinks.
Another male waiter was happy meeting people in his job.
The attendee had run up to the waiter as he started pouring the drinks.
Meanwhile, others that were not invited watched the party through the window.
